Notes: "Pairwise linguistic distances (patristic distances) between all nine populations were obtained from the published analysis of Gray et al. [40], which was based on lexical cognates across 210 items of basic vocabulary" "pairwise distances among the populations were calculated using the analysis of molecular variance (AMOVA) framework [39] in ARLEQUIN v. 3.5.1.2, as described in detail for music in Rzeszutek et al."
